name: stull-atlas
title: Stull Atlas
description: Interactive ceramic glaze chemistry visualization — plots glaze compositions on Stull charts with real-time oxide calculations. Live at stullatlas.app.
author: Howell
architecture: React + Vite frontend with Plotly.js for interactive charts. Tauri wrapper for desktop app. Supabase backend for user data and glaze storage. SPA with client-side routing.
design_decisions: Plotly.js for interactive, zoomable glaze chemistry charts
Vite for fast HMR during development
Tauri for optional native desktop wrapper
Supabase for auth and cloud glaze storage
React for component-based UI with complex state management
gotchas: Port 5173 is Vite's default — conflicts with other Vite projects
Tauri requires Rust toolchain installed for desktop builds
Supabase project must be active for cloud features
Plotly bundles are large — impacts initial load time
Has active git repo — coordinate changes carefully
history: v3.5.0 — current public release at stullatlas.app
notes: Flagship project. Public-facing with real users. Has git history. Treat with care.
